textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
It's another Feeding Frenzy bonus stage! Lots of fish 
 to eat, but watch out for the mines and the poisonous
 mutant minnows.

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 If you get eaten or killed on a bonus stage, you it doesn't
 cost you a life. So take some chances out and try to clear
 the stage before the timer runs out. Good Luck!
